channel.title: Soul-Xile Pk/PvP server [BETA]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/nophp/signaturepics/sigpic213328_2.gif[/img]
Hey guys we are in beta stage atm and i am just putting this online just so that i can see if people can find some bugs issues that i have yet not to be found. But here are some features to the server..
[url=http://soul-xile.tk/]Website[/url]
[url=http://soul-xile.netii.net/index.php?action=Webclient]Webclient[/url]
Features: Flawless Combat Clipped Following Clipped Combat following i forgot what item models but 565+ item models 2 Custom interfaces Ancient Curses Re Wrote combat system Oldschool Gameframe Cacke Szie is around 10-18kb Duel Arena Soulsplit Base I rewrote max hit forumla's for mage/melee/range Redid the spec max hits Npc+Player Clipped Following Correct Dragon Claws spec Formula Better defense system. All Barrows set affects works. Rs type stats. Perfect bonus's Near rs combat. Old school Gramframe Newer item models
[COLOR=blue]Now what you have all been waiting for!
Pictures:[/color] [IMG]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/1562/0a52cbc8419b4deba9499a8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/5511/95de6ccbf3ce4d75a0425b4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/3416/93ce8e76ca1442a58a98830.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/6361/f046ffc8afe74002b96c477.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/3476/f3fc52525ad740c8bc4139d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8674/c00eda50b6b44b10b17736b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/2739/a3aa0d843b874513819f503.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8641/ddef4dabbe604447ade498a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/3876/ce37c675eaf449b4a50d77e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/451/a5efe0d9c0d049ce972e120.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/7748/55879d586e4a4b25843be0b.png[/img] Fail attempt at getting the ags spec picture but that is the ags spec.
Credits go to: Soulsplit R-S Community and my self.[/CENTER]
[size=18pt]NOTE:THIS IS MY FIRST SERVER CODED SO PLEASE DONT LEAVE RUDE COMMENTS[/size]

item.title: Soul-Xile Pk/PvP server [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

tyb97:

The whole idea of “fast switching” is a lie.

ALSO: Anyone who uses this as a way of Advertising or showing Development; most likely don’t know what they’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Soul-Xile Pk/PvP server [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You know I wouldn’t doubt it if this is that same server that keeps “closing” after two weeks of being up. Played the server twice, donated twice, will never play again.

Good luck though

Read full topic

item.title: Soul-Xile Pk/PvP server [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“yeaa buddy, post:16, topic:464146”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=567979.msg4128684#msg4128684 date=1350787833]
The whole idea of “fast switching” is a lie.
[/quote]

There is only decent switching. No server can have GREAT switching.[/quote]
Switching at any speed is a lie. Sure it may appear to the user that it is switching your equipment faster, but that is just the item switching containers in the client, but the data is already there server sided, as soon as the person clicks the item that is applied, and ready to be used when the next combat hit is calculated.

Read full topic

item.title: Soul-Xile Pk/PvP server [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @yeaa_buddy yeaa buddy
item.description:
@yeaa_buddy wrote:

tyb97:

The whole idea of “fast switching” is a lie.

There is only decent switching. No server can have GREAT switching.

Read full topic

item.title: Soul-Xile Pk/PvP server [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @relentlesspk relentlesspk
item.description:
@relentlesspk wrote:

Oh, your the guy that went spamming in Reflections Cheat Client for commands.

Lonelypk:

Wow i logged in the game and tested switching it was litterly unbaleavble flawless! Sadly little people but good job ill be on 24/7

Nice making a new account. Try better next time. I see how his first post was saying this server is good and how you logged right out when you posted the reply.

@Unbelievable switching - Unbelievable switching? Unbelievable switching is like super fast with no delay. Something close to unbelievable switching would be


Credits to FroyoScape.

The only unbelievable switching is the 1 second delay between you logging out from Lonelypk and getting on igotguts3.

Date Registered:
October 17, 2012, 02:54:04 PM
Last Active:
October 17, 2012, 02:57:35 PM

Hmm?

Read full topic
